product_name: USAOPOLY Holiday Edition Scrabble Game - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Deck the halls with a holiday twist on this popular word game. The USAopoly Holiday Edition of Scrabble includes classic Scrabble fun and ways to earn bonus points for words related to the season. Gift tag cards add holiday cheer as players enhance their scores; instructions included for all-new custom game playing. Designed for 2-4 players, ages 8+. Closeout.
short_description: Deck the halls with a holiday twist on this popular word game. The USAopoly Holiday Edition of Scrabble includes classic Scrabble fun and ways to earn bonus points for words related to the season.
